name: @calculang/standalone
description: A standalone compiler for calculang, which can be imported directly into modern browsers
author: Declan Naughton

scripts.download: curl https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/eslint-linter-browserify@9.17.0/linter.mjs/+esm | head -n -1 > eslint-linter-browserify.mjs && curl https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@babel/standalone@7.26.4/babel.js/+esm | head -n -1 > babel.mjs && curl https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@dagrejs/graphlib@2.2.4/+esm | head -n -1 > graphlib.mjs # last line is sourcemap: remove for vitest
scripts.downloadBAD: curl -o babel.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@babel/standalone@7.24.10/babel.js?+esm && curl -o babel.js.map https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@babel/standalone@7.24.10/babel.js.map?+esm && curl https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@dagrejs/graphlib@2.2.4/+esm | head -n -1 > graphlib.mjs # last line is sourcemap: remove for vitest
